name: Random Yandere Simulator Mission Mode ID Generator
name_original: Random Yandere Simulator Mission Mode ID Generator
description:
DISCLAIMER: Yandere Simulator is NOT included with this program.

Hello, this is my first project uploaded to Itch io! :) It was created in a few hours with my limited knowledge of Python >:3c 

Do you already have Yandere Simulator?

Have you ever played Mission Mode and wondered, "Hmm, I wish I had a random mission ID!"?

If you answered yes to both of those questions, you'll enjoy my program which randomly generates a mission mode ID, which can be copied and pasted onto the 'Load Mission' screen on Mission Mode.

All you need to do is download the program, then follow the instructions on the "README" text document.
